divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the kitchen when I noticed a bright light, I grabbed the camera and took pictures of the object. I observed it for ten minutes, the object was stationary and it went into the water. I have never seen this before. This was during the day time and I had clear view of the object.
Summary: it was hovering for ten minutes and went into the water. It was very strong beam of light that caught my attention and it was big.
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around November 2nd 2012
